replies.body: Riot, all we really want is Summoners Rift Winter Map :( The Syndra skin is nice though...

I started this game back in season 2 during the fall so before we were all used to being treated with special game modes the winter rift was a very nice and fresh change of pace for me. Sure the game was the same but the music was so soothing and relaxing with a hint of mystery. Even though those graphics are far outdated by today's standards I would go back to the old winter rift in a heart beat because of how different and cool (no pun intended) it looked. If you prefer other things that they do for winter then by all means enjoy them. I like the poro king thing but not as much as Winter Rift but that is just my opinion.

This really makes me wish i was playing since the game was released, since i started last year the snowdown was my favorite event. Like you, i had started in the fall, i really do hope to see a snowy summoners rift, would really make it a wonderful experience.
As more of a casual player, I actually like the Poro King mayhem more.

One problem they did it before and they got complaints from people saying they can see some skill shot abilities all that clearly so riot doesn't do that other wise some champs may get special treatment for having and ability people may not see which was the case with the winter map they made.

I feel like an easy fix to that would to not color the whole map; just put some white fluff on trees and/or walls that are out of the way, and maybe put some frost on river or on towers. Still festive but without recoloring the whole map and messing with skillshots
Please please please riot! Snowy Rift for Preseason! :)

I know im gonna get downvoted for telling the truth but yall need to grow up. You guys need to learn patience.

Since when has expecting professionalism from a company bad. Being ahead of schedule/on-time is an admirable trait. Saying "grow up" and "learn patience" isn't good company excuse for not being on time. Trust me. I am a doctor. {{champion:36}}

The thing is, however, that he is correct. What the OP doesn't realize is that The Harrowing is NOT Halloween. This has been discussed and explained over and over. And he's not saying that "Grow up" and "learn patience" is what Riot says. He's just saying that as a mature adult, which i will agree with. If you expect everything to come when you want it, then I'm sorry but you're in for a disappointment. Correct me if I'm wrong, but If i remember correctly, Riot never gave a set release date of The Harrowing prior to the actual start of it so no, they were not late because that would technically be impossible. That's my two cents on the subject.
